summary: Max out non-combat Professions and gain all perks.
descriptionHtml:
Update: Check out my balanced class mod here: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5909

This is a series of bat files that will allow you to max out your profession of choice.  I should clarify that by \"profession\" I am specifically referring to the job-like skills in the game.  That means all of the non-combat related skills.  Specifically: Alchemy, Enchanting, Lockpicking, Pickpocket, Speechcraft, and Smithing. 

::How to Install::

Copy the file/s you want to use to your main Skyrim Directory

::How to Use::

Open the console with the ~ key and type in:

bat TruePro - Learn every profession and all associated perks.  Alchemy, Enchanting, Speech, Smithing, Pickpocket, Lockpicking.

bat HammerSmith - Max Smithing + All Smithing Perks

bat MasterThief - Max Lockpicking and Pickpocket + All Perks

bat Orator - Max Speech + All Perks

bat GreenThumb - Max Alchemy + All Perks

bat Transfigurator - Max Enchanting + All Perks

Version 0.2 -Fixed a typo in the trupro file for pickpocket.
author: Zohar127

files.name: True Professional -Max out non-combat job skills
